news.title: Biden signs executive order on immigration
news.description: President Biden signed an executive order on Tuesday to create a task force that will reunite migrant families separated at the border under the Trump administration's 'zero tolerance' policy.
news.author: John Doe

news.title: Apple releases new MacBook Pro
news.description: Apple unveiled its latest MacBook Pro on Wednesday, featuring a new M2 chip, improved keyboard, and a notch in the display. The laptop is available for pre-order now and will be released next month.
news.author: Jane Smith

news.title: Tesla stock surges after earnings report
news.description: Tesla's stock price jumped by 10% on Thursday after the company reported better-than-expected earnings for the fourth quarter of 2021. The electric car maker's revenue and net income both beat analysts' estimates.
news.author: Bob Johnson

news.title: Netflix announces new show from Game of Thrones creators
news.description: Netflix has greenlit a new series from Game of Thrones showrunners David Benioff and D.B. Weiss. The show, called 'The Three-Body Problem,' is based on the Chinese sci-fi novel of the same name.
news.author: Emily Lee

news.title: Serena Williams announces retirement
news.description: Tennis superstar Serena Williams announced her retirement on Friday after a storied career that included 23 Grand Slam singles titles. Williams, 40, said she was looking forward to spending more time with her family.
news.author: Mike Brown
